EmailTemplate.name: SRT follow up with video link
EmailTemplate.subject: School Readiness Talk: Video Link
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
As mentioned on the evening, attached below is a link to the "Marshmallow Test" video which demonstrates self regulation in children.
Unfortunately due to copyright restrictions, we are unable to distribute copies of Mrs Robson's presentation.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=amsqeYOk--w
Regards
Bruce Perry Registrar/Mathematics Teacher
phone 02 92869507 email BPerry@sacs.nsw.edu.au
